txt.en: Langhár becomes a bear and follows the scent!
'It is good to see friendly faces! Oof...'

Deep within Mirkwood, an ancient enemy has returned. A Beorning trader is lost within a maze of trees and thorns, predators closing in around him. Find a way through, and save him before it is too late.
'I have stunned the fiend! Get him out of here!'
Instance: Deep in the Darkening Wood
'We have the Beorning. Now, we need to retreat, quickly! We will soon be swarmed by Taurogrim! I will have to return later with a stronger force.'

'This place is like a maze! How do we proceed?'

Langhár sniffs the air.

'Ah, a familiar scent on the wind! Follow me, and stay close, lest you find yourself lost in these woods!'
Thorlind stuns Borzagor with a well-places shot!

Sterkist is somewhere within these woods.

You should follow Langhár and find Sterkist.

<rgb=#FF0000>Langhár must survive!</rgb>
Langhár stops to sniff the air, and then continues
With Sterkist recovered, it is time to escape.\n\nYou should talk to Thorlind.
Sterkist is under attack!\n\nYou should defeat Borzagor the Grisly!
You have arrived at the edge of a section of deep woods.\n\nYou should talk to Langhár.
